text:
Exercise:
Update your work journal!
Go to your gists: <https://gist.github.com/mine>
Find your gist titled “work-journal.md”
Click “Edit”
Add your new content towards the top
```## YYYY-MM-DD
### Learnings
- (Describe things you have learned, things you are struggling with and how you plan to tackle them)

### Interesting things
- (List coding resources you have found and describe why they’re interesting)```
Update the content with today’s date and your content for the learning and interesting things section

For learnings, focus on what you learned during the team API project - What was your role? What went well? What would you do differently?

Find your gist titled “work-journal.md”
Click “Edit”
Add your new content towards the top

## YYYY-MM-DD
### Learnings
- (Describe things you have learned, things you are struggling with and how you plan to tackle them)

### Interesting things

Update the content with today’s date and your content for the learning and interesting things section

For learnings, focus on what you learned during the team API project - What was your role? What went well? What would you do differently?
